info.abstract:
[Type] Management.
[Behaviour] Start, stop and get information about clusters of I/O servers.
[Parameters] - action : use one of the following types: "info": get information about clusters deployed by the user (default); "info_cluster": get information about all the clusters (reserved to administrators); "deploy": try to reserve hosts and starts I/O servers; "undeploy": stop reservation and I/O servers. - nhost : number of hosts to be reserved as well as number of I/O servers to be started over them. - host_partition : name of user-defined partition to be used to group hosts.
[System parameters] - exec_mode : operator execution mode. Possible values are async (default) for asynchronous mode, sync for synchronous mode with json-compliant output. - objkey_filter : filter on the output of the operator written to file (default=all => no filter, none => no output): cluster_summary : show cluster status, reserved hosts and available resources; cluster_list : show cluster list; cluster_list_summary : show cluster list summary. cluster_user : show cluster user list (reserved to administrators); cluster_user_summary : show cluster user list summary (reserved to administrators).
[Examples] Start 3 I/O servers: OPH_TERM: oph_cluster action=deploy;nhost=3;host_partition=cluster; SUBMISSION STRING: "operator=oph_cluster;action=deploy;nhost=3;host_partition=cluster;"
